item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

public void minigame1(){ } if((absX >=1915 && absX <=1915 && absY >=1915 && absY <=1915 ) heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; { else } if(pkpoints == 20) { additem(1050, 1); sendMessage("You get a santa hat!"); }

then id need it to reset your pk points in that area but idk how and if i screwed up on the example plz correct me thats jsut my thought on how i would do it
